entry.title: CyclePlus Recumbent Bike with Arm Exercise
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 2595.00 - 2695.00 (2 variants)

SKU: Hci-Fitness-CP-400 

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> CyclePlus

 

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly Options

                    In Stock Ready to Ship

 

 

 Click the Play Button Above to View the CyclePlus Product Overview Video




Ideal for All Age Groups

User Height Range

 4'11" to 6'4"

 Max User Weight

400 lbs

Total Body Workout

 

Dual action recumbent bike with arm motion provides users with a total body workout. 

 

Walk Through Design

 Unobstructed walk through frame design allows even the most deconditioned users to easily enter the CyclePlus. 

 

Wide Cushioned Seat

The CyclePlus has a 17" wide padded seat pad and contoured seat back to make your extended workouts more comfortable. 

The easy adjust knob allows users to stay seated and quickly adjust the seat position. 


CyclePlus Seat Dimensions 

Adjustable Pedal Straps

Extra wide textured non-slip foot pedals with adjustable straps ensure safety and comfort during your workout. 

Heart Rate Programs

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the CyclePlus features contact heart rate in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

Water Bottle Holder

Easy to reach water bottle holder connected to the seat handles. 


Interactive Training

The CyclePlus is compatible with Kinomap and other virtual training apps to help keep you motivated during your workouts. Requires your own tablet or smart phone and additional subscriptions. 

Large and Intuitive Display

The CyclePlus has a 7" LCD display with 25 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button for manual training. 

Integrated media shelf adjusts to hold tablets and phones. 


Optional Ortho Pedals

Add additional comfort and security to the CyclePlus by purchasing the optional Ortho Heel Cups.

Add to your order for $100 

$200 Value, Order Now and Save 

Use the dropdown menu at the top of this page to select the option to add Ortho Pedals to your CyclePlus.

Compact Design

The sleek design of the CyclePlus is only 24" wide ideal for fitting in a spare bedroom or in a corner of the living room. 

63" Long x 24" Wide

Transport Wheels

Conveniently move the CyclePlus with the transport wheels.  

Self Powered or Plug In

The CyclePlus can either be plugged in to a standard wall outlet or if there is not an outlet nearby, you can use it without the plug, activating the internal generator system.

Burn Calories

Engage your upper and lower body to burn more calories than on a traditional recumbent bike. 

Family Owned & Operated

HealthCare International is proud to be one of the longest standing family owned and operated fitness equipment manufacturers based in the USA!

Buy American Act

Please note that ALL HCI Fitness products qualify for the “Buy American Act”.

LIGHT COMMERCIAL WARRANTY

3 Year Parts

1 Year Labor

Lifetime on the Frame




White Glove Assembly

View  our nationwide white glove assembly options at checkout.

  

32 Levels

Wide range of resistance from a low starting resistance to a challenging workout.

Isokintic Training

Controlled RPM recovery training.

Light Commercial Grade

Used in Physical Therapy Offices, Cardiac Rehab and Home Gyms.

17" Wide Memory Foam Seat

3" Tick Memory Foam  17" Wide Memory Foam Seat with Contoured Reclining Seat Back.

Connect to KinoMaps

The CyclePlus display allows you to connect to 3rd party applications for virtual training.

Compact Dimensions

The assembled size of the CyclePlus is 63" x 24". 

Lifetime Frame Warranty

The CyclePlus is backed with a Lifetime Frame, 3 Year Parts, and 1 Year Labor  warranty.

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly

**In -Stock Ready to Ship **

The PhysioCycle XT Recumbent Cross Trainer is the ideal product for consumers and Healthcare facilities that are looking for a versatile exercise product that provides a smooth and enjoyable total body workout.

 

The PhysioCycle XT Recumbent Cross Trainer has been designed so that the user can select from or combine exercise modalities, which include; Bi-Directional Upper Body Ergometer and Recumbent Cycle. The PhysioCyle XT has dependent upper and lower body, meaning both the arms and the legs will move during operation.

User Height Range

User Height Range

5" to 6'3"

Max User Weight

300 lbs

Breathable Mesh Seat Back

The high quality mesh seat back provides support and comport with the breathable material. 16" wide foam padding seat base and ergonomic shape accommodates a wide range of users.


Want to upgrade to a wider swivel seat?

Click Here to View all Products with a 20" Swivel Seat

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the PhysioCycle XT features heart rate sensors in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

.

Bi-Directional Resistance

Resistance in both the forward and backward pedaling motion. 

Connected Arms and Legs

The PhysioCycle XT has a connected pedaling motion for your arms and legs. 

The smart design gives you two workouts in product ideal for use in your home or facility. 

 

Water Bottle Holder

Integrated water bottle holder to help keep you hydrated during your workout.

entry.title: PhysioMax Total Body Exerciser Upper Body Ergometer and Recumbent Bike
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type: Upper Body Ergometer
Price: 4495.00 - 5145.00 (4 variants)

SKU: Hci-Fitness-TBT-1000

Products -> Total Body Trainers -> PhysioMax

 

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly Options

Optional Assembly and Install Available at Check Out

 

Click the Play Button Above to View the PhysioMax Product Overview Video

Two in One Space Saver!

The PhysioMax Independent Bi-Directional Upper Body Ergometer and Recumbent Bike all-in-one Total Body Trainer is the newest innovation in affordable Total Body rehabilitation products with patent pending "independent action."

 

The PhysioMax's independent arm and leg motion allows users to work their upper body (Upper Body Ergometer) & lower body (recumbent bike) independently from each other.

 

The resistance on the PhysioMax is bi-directional & can be adjusted providing versatility for any application. It features a walk-thru design with a removable seat for wheelchair access. The oversize seat swivels to accommodate users with low mobility.

 

The PhysioMax Independent Bi-Directional Upper Body Ergometer and Recumbent Bike all-in-one Total Body Trainer has adjustable hand cranks, pedals, as well as an adjustable UBE arm can be raised or lowered for variable arm positions. Resistance varies from the low "easy start" for deconditioned users and goes up to level 16. The large 9" LCD console has preset programs & displays speed, time, distance, pulse , RPM, Watts, METS & calories.

 

User Height Range

 5' to 6'6"

Max User Weight

500 lbs

 

Bi-Directional Independent Upper and Lower Drive System

Unique Independent Drive System allows for the isolated use of either the upper or lower portion of the machine. In addition, both arms and legs can be used together for a total body workout.

Swivel Seat

360° Swivel Seat for entrance from the left or right side. 500 lb Weight Capacity and Oversized Seat Standard .

Adjustable Cranks

Easily adjust the upper body crank to accommodate more users!

Large and Intuitive Display

The PhysioMax has a 9" LCD display with 20 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button. 

With 32 levels of electronic resistance, the PhysioMax's resistance can be adjusted with a touch of a button.  The PhysioMax has a low starting resistance and manageable increments allowing users to gradually increase resistance. 

Removable Wheelchair Seat

Simply slide the seat off of the rail for wheelchair access.

Optional Arm Rest Kit

Add comfort and security to the PhysioMax TBT-1000  by purchasing the optional folding arm rest kit.

Add to your order for $300 

$350 Value, Order Now and Save 

Use the dropdown menu at the top of this page to select the option to add Arm Rests to your PhysioMax.

Contact Heart Rate Not Compatible

View More Images

Optional Adjustable Lower Body Cranks

In addition to being able to adjust knee flexion by moving the seat forward or backward, adding adjustable lower body cranks provides more adjustability for a wider range of users.

Add to your order for $350 

 Use the dropdown menu at the top of this page to select the option to add Adjustable Lower Body Cranks to your PhysioMax.

entry.title: PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer with Swivel Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type: Recumbent Linear Stepper Cross Trainer
Price: 3395.00 - 3695.00 (2 variants)




SKU: Hci-Fitness-LXT-700

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> PhysioStep LXT

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly Options

**In Stock - Ready to Ship **

 

 

Click the Play Button Above to View the PhysioStep LXT Product Overview Video

Advanced Physical Therapy Equipment at Home

The PhysioStep LXT clearly shows your workout information and on the large and easy to read display. The PhysioStep LXT display has 20 programs and a Quick Start button. 

  The display shows your workout Time, Distance, Calories, Pulse, Speed, Total Steps, Steps per Minute, Resistance Level, WATTs and METS. With all of your workout information on one screen you can easily keep your goals in sight!

 

Ideal for All Ages and Ability Levels

 

 

User Height Range

 4'6" to 6'4"

 Max User Weight

450 lbs

Linear Motion

 

Natural 2 to 1 Contralateral Arm and Leg Linear Stepping Motion. Just like in Physical Therapy. 

*Other brands claim to be the same, but do not have the same bio-mechanics as the products used by professionals. 

Swivel Seat

360° Swivel Seat for entrance from the left or right side. Easy to reach swivel seat lever on side of seat.

Having a swivel seat on your recumbent cross trainer not only makes it easier to get on and off the machine, it also protects your investment ensuring that you will be able to continue to use your PhysioStep LXT for years to come.

Oversized 20" Seat Base

The PhysioStep LXT has our largest and most comfortable seat. The 4" thick and 20" wide memory foam seat base provides premium comfort.

Large Foot Pedals

The PhysioStep LXT has large foot pedals with 4" heel cups to help support your foot. The included ankle and foot strap add additional support to keep you feet in the pedals. 

Lock in Place Swivel Tension Handles

Select any angle and lock your handles in place to work different muscle groups. 

Reclining Seat Back

Select from 3 different recline angles for the seat back position. 

Heart Rate Programs

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the PhysioStep LXT features heart rate sensors in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

Large and Intuitive Display

The PhysioStep LXT has a 9" LCD display with 20 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button. 

With 32 levels of electronic resistance, the PhysioStep LXT's resistance can be adjusted with a touch of a button.  The PhysioStep LXT has a low starting resistance and manageable increments allowing users to gradually increase resistance.

COMMERCIAL WARRANTY

3 Year Parts

1 Year Labor

Lifetime on the Frame

 

 About HCI Fitness

It's Time to Start Moving Today!

The PhysioStep LXT – Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer was proudly designed, developed, & patented in the USA to help a diverse range of people meet their personal goals and feel good doing it!

Whether it is for weight loss, general health improvement, cardiac rehabilitation, corporate wellness or transitioning from Physical Therapy to Home Exercise, the PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer is the ideal piece of equipment to get you moving!

The PhysioStep LXT recumbent linear stepping motion gives you an easy and effective low impact total body workout. It combines a stable and stress free recumbent sitting position, with the natural feeling of walking. The innovative Linear Stepping Motion is incredibly smooth and easy on your joints.

The PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer has a large, over sized “ultra comfortable” swivel seat that adjusts easily and fully rotates making this unit easily accessible for people with low mobility. Other features include a low profile walk through design & ergo grip handles to work your arm and core muscles. The fully adjustable arms, seat, and seat back accommodate a wide range of users.

The large 9" LCD display provides all your workout information in a clear and easy to read format. Built with high quality commercial components and available at an affordable price the PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer is perfect for commercial, medical, rehabilitation or home applications.

Let us help you take a Step in the right direction and get moving today!



 

 

↑Click the prequalify link at the top of the page above the price.
